blog.name: harrygivenchy
blog.title: Kissy.
blog.description: cecilia | 21 | i’m always thinking about harry |

answer:
“Please tell me it isn’t true..” he says, the sadness clear in his eyes as he watch you sit on the couch from opposite him. 

You hate this more than anything else; having to break someones heart. 

“I’m sorry,” you repeat, the guilt creeping up on you as you watch him, never having meant for any of this to happen. 

“I just.. I thought you liked me,” he says as he runs a hand through his hair, the frustration slowly growing. “I mean, we’ve been having such a good time lately and I definitely just thought there was something between us,” he mumbles, remembering how much banter there had been between the two of you lately. Harry thought your friendship could finally evolve to something more, but apparently he had been wrong.

“I didn’t mean to lead you on,” you explain, fumbling nervously with your hands. “I just never really saw us as more than friends.” You see something flash through his eyes as you watch him, eventually recognising it as hurt. 

“And you don’t think it will change?” he ask, a glimpse of hope appearing on his face as he watch you carefully. All he want is for you to give him a chance - give the two of you a chance.

“I-I don’t think so, no..” you say softly, feeling so bad about doing this, but you just want to be honest with him, so he could move on. “I’m interested in someone else,” you eventually say, causing the last bit of Harry’s heart to break.

“Oh.. Okay,” he says, looking down on his hands, clearing his throat to fight the lump that was forming. “I should go..” he stands up, fumbling with his hands and before you can stand up yourself, he just looks at you but gesture for you to stay put. “Don’t,” he whispers, not wanting your pity or for things to get worse between you. 

And as you watch him walk out of your front door, you know it’s the last time you’re gonna see him; causing your heart to break a little as well. 

Blurb night!

blog.name: cantquitu
blog.title: I Wish I Knew How To Quit You

summary: I wish people would stop saying Harry and Camille have broken up based on zero evidence. It’s pretty clear they’re still...
question: I wish people would stop saying Harry and Camille have broken up based on zero evidence. It’s pretty clear they’re still together, it’s just that they’re both private and aren’t flaunting their relationship everywhere. Still can’t believe they’ve been together a year now, like that’s gone so fast!
answer:
It’s not pretty clear. Nobody knows the status of their relationship. They may still be together, they may have split up but remained friends, their relationship may have developed to the point where they don’t spend all their time together anymore but are together occasionally…or something else entirely. 

Either way, we don’t know. And it’s none of our business unless they make it so.

blog.name: hunshine-styles
blog.title: Harry Freaking Styles
blog.description: Treat people with kindness. Be a lover, choose love, give love. Always.

answer:
Thank you for the message! I already answered on my previous ask, but I’ll put it here too and maybe add a few more from 1D days :)

11. What is your favorite lyric Harry wrote?
I actually have a few, so I’ll just share them in album order.
MMITH (one of the songs I relate to the most): “Gotta get better” x982752, “I walk the streets all day, running with the fears. ‘Cause you left me in the hallway, just take my pain away” (yes the live version with MY instead of THE) and “We don’t talk about it. It’s something we don’t do. ’Cause once you go without it, nothing else will do”

SOTT: “You can’t bribe the door on your way to the sky. You look pretty good down here, but you ain’t really good” 

ONLY ANGEL: “Open up your eyes, shut your mouth and see, that I’m still the only one who’s been in love with me” – can’t relate to it, but find it insanely sexy

ESNY: “I’ve been praying, I never did before. Understand I’m talking to the walls”

WOMAN: “I’m selfish, I know. I told you, but I know you never listen” and “Tempted, you know. Apologies are never gonna fix this, I’m empty, I know. Promises are broken like the stitches”

FTDT: the whole thing? Have you hear the rawness and pain in his voice during the entirety of the song? A full stab in the heart with a few twists afterwards too just to add that extra pain

MEDICINE: A BOP, so the whole thing haha 

OLIVIA: “When you go and I’m alone, you live in my imagination. The summertime and butterflies, all belong to your creation”

IICF: again, the whole song, but especially “I’ve got scars, even though they can’t always be seen. And pain gets hard, but now you’re here and I don’t feel a thing”

WDBHG (even though he didn’t write it alone): once again, A BOP. Enough said.

WITW: “If you’re lost, just look for me. You’ll find me in the region of the summer stars” and “I know we’ll be alright, child. Just close your eyes and see. I’ll be by your side, any time you’re needing me”

JALBOYH: “I’ll still be a fool. ‘Cause I’m a fool for you” and “I heard a little love is better than none”

blog.name: hunshine-styles
blog.title: Harry Freaking Styles
blog.description: Treat people with kindness. Be a lover, choose love, give love. Always.

question: 8, 11 and 12 😊
answer:
FTDThank you for the message! 

8. What’s your favorite Harry quote from interviews etc.?
As I said on my previous ask, he says too many good things to pick just one. I should actually make a little journal with all the quotes he gives us because THERE ARE TOO MANY GOOD ONES.

11. What is your favorite lyric Harry wrote?
I actually have a few (and I’m only counting his solo album here, not the 1D songs), so I’ll just share them in album order.
MMITH (one of the songs I relate to the most): “Gotta get better” x982752, “I walk the streets all day, running with the fears. ‘Cause you left me in the hallway, just take my pain away” (yes the live version with MY instead of THE) and “We don’t talk about it. It’s something we don’t do. ’Cause once you go without it, nothing else will do”

SOTT: “You can’t bribe the door on your way to the sky. You look pretty good down here, but you ain’t really good” 

ONLY ANGEL: “Open up your eyes, shut your mouth and see, that I’m still the only one who’s been in love with me” – can’t relate to it, but find it insanely sexy

ESNY: “I’ve been praying, I never did before. Understand I’m talking to the walls”

WOMAN: “I’m selfish, I know. I told you, but I know you never listen” and “Tempted, you know. Apologies are never gonna fix this, I’m empty, I know. Promises are broken like the stitches”

FTDT: the whole thing? Have you hear the rawness and pain in his voice during the entirety of the song? A full stab in the heart with a few twists afterwards too just to add that extra pain

12. What are you hoping for hs2 - aesthetic-wise and song-wise?
I don’t even know what to expect because he is so unpredictable. I also don’t want to have any expectations and just let him surprise me with his genius mind!

11. What is your favorite lyric Harry wrote?
I actually have a few (and I’m only counting his solo album here, not the 1D songs), so I’ll just share them in album order.
MMITH (one of the songs I relate to the most): “Gotta get better” x982752, “I walk the streets all day, running with the fears. ‘Cause you left me in the hallway, just take my pain away” (yes the live version with MY instead of THE) and “We don’t talk about it. It’s something we don’t do. ’Cause once you go without it, nothing else will do”

SOTT: “You can’t bribe the door on your way to the sky. You look pretty good down here, but you ain’t really good” 

ONLY ANGEL: “Open up your eyes, shut your mouth and see, that I’m still the only one who’s been in love with me” – can’t relate to it, but find it insanely sexy

ESNY: “I’ve been praying, I never did before. Understand I’m talking to the walls”

WOMAN: “I’m selfish, I know. I told you, but I know you never listen” and “Tempted, you know. Apologies are never gonna fix this, I’m empty, I know. Promises are broken like the stitches”

FTDT: the whole thing? Have you hear the rawness and pain in his voice during the entirety of the song? A full stab in the heart with a few twists afterwards too just to add that extra pain

12. What are you hoping for hs2 - aesthetic-wise and song-wise?
I don’t even know what to expect because he is so unpredictable. I also don’t want to have any expectations and just let him surprise me with his genius mind!

trail.content_raw:
FTDThank you for the message! 

8. What’s your favorite Harry quote from interviews etc.?
As I said on my previous ask, he says too many good things to pick just one. I should actually make a little journal with all the quotes he gives us because THERE ARE TOO MANY GOOD ONES.

It’s something we don’t do. ’Cause once you go without it, nothing else will do”

SOTT: “You can’t bribe the door on your way to the sky. You look pretty good down here, but you ain’t really good” 

ONLY ANGEL: “Open up your eyes, shut your mouth and see, that I’m still the only one who’s been in love with me” – can’t relate to it, but find it insanely sexy

ESNY: “I’ve been praying, I never did before. Understand I’m talking to the walls”

WOMAN: “I’m selfish, I know. I told you, but I know you never listen” and “Tempted, you know. Apologies are never gonna fix this, I’m empty, I know. Promises are broken like the stitches”

I don’t even know what to expect because he is so unpredictable. I also don’t want to have any expectations and just let him surprise me with his genius mind!

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: hey lovie could you do an imagine where you have asthma? maybe you and harry go on a run or something bc you haven’t had an...
question: hey lovie could you do an imagine where you have asthma? maybe you and harry go on a run or something bc you haven’t had an attack in years but you suddenly can’t breath and he helps bring you back to reality? not too dramatic though. some people take it too far but ik you can make it perfect bc you’re a fucking angel. love youuu
answer:
“f-fuck! shit! s-sit upright!”

even if you explained with your hands that the asthma attack you’re having, something you haven’t had in years, is nothing major — harry’s still freaking out a tad bit.

it’s hard to breathe and you’re really aware of that, trying to take long deep breaths and it’s harder to concentrate because you haven’t done this in so long and the view of harry panicking isn’t helping either.

“shhh.”

he’s silenced by that and his eyes widen when he realized what he’s caused, sitting on the pavement with only his feet touching so he’s ready to spring up at any moment, still regretting that he forgot to bring an inhaler and you’re hushing him for that too.

he knows he can’t help without freaking so he lets you take control, looking at him as you’re doing so and he’s doing it with you, wiping the sweat forming on your face as he’s uneasy and still guilty.

some minutes pass soon enough and you’re all collected, while he still isn’t as he keeps looking at you every now and then when you’re on the route back to home; and it’s only walking now. not even brisk walking. but just walking as he insisted.

“i don’t know how i’ll cope when you’re gonna give birth.”

he suddenly says and your eyebrows raise at that, his towel still patted against you as he momentarily stops the two of you, tidying your hair a bit.

and he doesn’t know why he’s said that but he’s thankful that he did so, because he really didn’t know how would he when according to his knowledge, was that childbirth is one of the most painful things someone could experience.

“m’not pregnant, harry.”

“yet.”

//

lovie i LOVE YOU

blog.name: hunshine-styles
blog.title: Harry Freaking Styles
blog.description: Treat people with kindness. Be a lover, choose love, give love. Always.

question: 7, 16, 23🌷
answer:
Thank you for the message!

7. What’s your favorite Harry quote from tour?
That is a hard one because there were so many good quotes where he speaks about spreading love and kindness. I don’t think I could pick only one. There is the one before SOTT about the world being horrible at the moment, which was beautiful, but then we get the comedic ones like “we are all a little gay, you know?” 
He is constantly giving good Huotes.


16. Why do you love Harry?
I could write an entire book as to why, but to try and summarise it into a couple of sentences… He is the most incredible human being I have ever seen in my life. He has the purest soul and as we all say, his looks are just a bonus. He is my role model and I hope one day I can be as kind and good to the world as he is. I would do anything to be his friend and show him how amazing and loved he is by everyone. 


23. What is your favorite Harry picture from Instagram - solo and 1d era?
LISTEN, H’s Instagram is 100% my aesthetic. I LOVE IT. Don’t make me pick a favourite child like that. It’s not fair. Can I just say his entire account? Including the white squares? Because that’s what I’m gonna do hahaha

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: what about dom!harry finding out about a kink that y/n has after seeing her browser history or something, and teasing her about...
question: what about dom!harry finding out about a kink that y/n has after seeing her browser history or something, and teasing her about it before they try it for the first time :’)
answer:
“oh wow, mate. that’s HISTORY right there!!”
“what do you mean iT’S PERFECT FOR US?”
“yikes, IS THAT ALL YOU THINK ABOUT, lad?”
“is that a secret?????”
“PUT ME IN ON THAT!!!!”

harry would keep saying things the whole day while the both of you just go out and run errands and the same time and you think you’ve never wanted to go home this desperately.

and he’s putting sexual innuendos to almost everything he says and even makes the bold move to look at you right after or even during for fuck’s sake, and it brings the heat to your cheeks as someone else looks at you for how loud and how accusatory he sounded.

“should keep your browsers private, love.”

he’d finally say after having your irritated gaze on the side of his head for so long once the both of you are finally in the car, your eyes widening at the connection and the realization he’s trying to prove, a pinch on his side that makes him jolt.

harry only snickers, wanting to get home too beyond anything.

“or else m’gonna have an even bigger liking for your kink than you do.”

blog.name: harrygivenchy
blog.title: Kissy.
blog.description: cecilia | 21 | i’m always thinking about harry |

summary: Would you wanna write something about going grocery shopping with Harry? It’s always the domestic, normal things that get me!
question: Would you wanna write something about going grocery shopping with Harry? It’s always the domestic, normal things that get me!
answer:
“Can we get pickles, please?” you ask as you wobble down the aisle, holding onto the shopping cart for support as Harry pushes it. “Pickles?” he says as he laughs softly, watching you with endearment. 

“Yeah.. The baby’s craving pickles,” you chuckle, giving your growing belly a soft rub. “Uh! And whipped cream,” a hum leave your lips, already thinking about the delicious combination of the two. 

Harry place a soft kiss on your temple before grabbing the jar of pickles off the shelf, his hand coming to rest on your bump. “Is there anything else my two girls are craving?” he asks in a low voice, a soft smile tugging on his lips. 

“Mm…” you hum as you look over your shoulder and down into your cart, seeing how it’s already full of thing you have been needing to stock up on and things you’ve been craving recently. “I think we’re good,” you chuckle, turning back around to him.

“Good. I jus’ want you to have anything you need, m’love,” he whispers before stealing another kiss, his thumb slowly rubbing your bump.

“Now, daddy’s craving chocolate, so we’re getting some of that,” he chuckles, slowly pulling away and pushing the cart along the isle as you wobble beside him. 

“Can we get the one with hazelnuts then?” you say, earning another chuckle from Harry, “Of course we can baby,” he says, the endearment only growing.
